full_text: A new baby blanket is in my pattern collection, namely friends of mine will have baby in May 2022. It’s a fully reversible pattern that I recommend for beginner knitters too, you have to know just the following techniques: Cast on Knit Purls Bind off If you like the pattern and you would like to read more from me, follow the Facebook and Instagram page of the blog. www.facebook.com/purlsbypalma www.instagram.com/purlsbypalma
